issues_reports.text: @ATT- CSR’s have tried to transfer me 3 times and then disconnected me. 2 days in a row. Called back, “Diamond” #20828 decides she is gonna be rude and says she will transfer me to “loyalty” and hangs up on me. So incredibly disgusted in your service. Still have no resolution!
@ATT Why is your 5G service slower than LTE?
@cleekers … Uverse shows SciFi airing Keep the Home Fires Burning on 3/4.  They never air reruns of WE.  Perhaps a good sign of things to come?

@ATT Solve our riddle....
When will we have internet service?????

@ATT @ATTHelp is literally the worst at billing... got my Note 20 ultra in 8/2020.. under the $1,000 for your phone gimmick (they still peddle) and have been paying for my phone every since, never a credit. mother did the same.. they did her the same way. thanks for nothing
@ATTHelp @ATT system is broken. This is all ridiculous from such an old trusted company. Why should I be responsible for the shortcomings in your system? Please fix this ASAP!

@ATTHelp 
Update on outage noone responding online, chat in app or here!!!
I realize @ATT has discovered if they put everyone on cellphones, they can now run people out of battery before they ever talk to customer support.

@ATTHelp @ATT I started a new Internet connection with 1Gbps Fiber in October 2021. I was supposed to get two rewards worth $50 and $200 with that. I got the $50 reward card within a week, but never got the $200 reward. I contacted the reward live chat twice on Oct 26 and (1/4)
Does @ATT have the worst customer service, or is there a worse company? Just asking.

@ATTHelp Did you even read the message? No. I said real people, so you pasted an auto response. You are no more than a biological copy pasta robot. The people i msg may be real but they cannot help this and you dont care because if you tell me in a private dm, No backlash from the public
@ATTHelp The AT&T website customer service is pure trash!

@ATT was suppose to unlock my phone today, I met all requirements, now they aren't unlocking it 

frauds, out to hurt the little guy, I'll never use them again

@ATTHelp Oh look it went from dm us fir help to shut up we sent you a meaasge because we do not read or listen to our customers. I wonder if a real person will ever actually reply. My guess is that this rudeness continues without end.
@ATT your fraud department is CLOSED?! HOLY ****!
My reception been **** all damn day @ATT
@kaorrosi @ATT yall need to fix your ****.

@ATTHelp 
What the hell is going on in San Antonio 
No help I dont need a link to the :&%&&$-OUTAGE MAP I KNOW THERE IS A F***** OUTAGE !!!
USELESS CUSTOMER SERVICE

@ATTHelp @ScottinBayV I dm you all NO RESPONSE
JUST FIX IT
@ATTHelp Internet service had been out almost 48 hours. Mangers has no idea when 75253 area will be back to up and running .. can you give me some insight?

Just spend an hour on the phone with @ATT and they are hustling me. This is ridiculous behavior for a loyal client who pays you for internet and several wireless devises. Completely being taken advantage of and no one can seem to resolve the problem.
@ATT I have an issue w/ att fiber tech setup my modem but neglected to connect att digi phone to the jacks in my house now att wants me to pay them UNACCEPTABLE

@ATT Your sending this **** OUT WITHOUT HELPING US HERE???
NO INTERNET FOR 48 HRS
Gotta love @ATT  - charge you for stuff you never asked for then hang up after 30 minutes on hold. Must be nice to be so big that you don’t have to care about taking care of your customers.
@ATT  You mother *******, second time you have allowed someone to take over my phone, even with my security codes preventing this. **** you and your entire network, your stores are full of criminals!
6 months trying to fix this **** paying 111 dollars a month for 1mbps and calling off of work for tech not to show multiple times in a row. Then they wanna charge me to show up now @att clowns
@ATT Solve the riddle: fix my slow internet

After this plan is paid off,
I’m never using @ATTBusiness again. Been a customer for about 14 years and have never dealt with insanity such as this disorganization and lack of customer service. Way to lose a long time customer

@KatrinaColumbo @ATTHelp Not sure what you mean here. Iv only been doing this for a few hours. Feel free to add to it by all means. I am making a guess that you have an issue that has taken several days now to get help for. I simply want to be clear MY POST is only an hour or so old at most.
Lately @ATT service has been terrible!!!!!!! Why!?!?

company_posts.name: AT&T Help
company_posts.text: Hi there, this is Elina. I'm here to take care of this. Please join us in a DM to find a solution. -ElinaB

company_posts.name: AT&T Help
company_posts.text: I want to take care of this for you personally. Just send me a DM, and I’ll make sure we get this sorted as quickly and smoothly as possible.

company_posts.name: AT&T Help
company_posts.text: Hello there, we hear you, and we're here to assist. Please meet us in DM, and we'll be glad to take a closer look on this matter to help. ^LauraE https://t.co/Uyi4xN5vDH
